articles.author: Hannah Getahun
articles.title: Elon Musk's sister Tosca talks Twitter deal says he would buy company
articles.description: Tosca Musk told the Sunday Times that her family was used to "taking risks" in their business ventures.
articles.content:
Tosca Musk said she believes her brother, Tesla and Space X CEO Elon Musk, would go through with his $44 billion deal to acquire Twitter.
"If he says he's going to do it I would believe that he's go… [+938 chars]

articles.title: MI Gov Gretchen Whitmer fights for abortion rights following the fall of Roe
articles.description: Whitmer's focus following the fall of Roe v. Wade has been on her 18- and 20-year-old daughters: "They now have fewer rights than I've had my whole life."
articles.content:
For Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer, the fight for reproductive rights and abortion access is deeply personal.

articles.title: Group to pay $200 to anyone who provides location of SCOTUS
articles.description: A group called ShutDownDC is offering money for the whereabouts of conservative SCOTUS justices. The group protested Justice Brett Kavanaugh while he ate at a Morton's steakhouse on Wednesday.
articles.content:
A left-wing organization will offer individuals up to $200 for sharing the current whereabouts of conservative Supreme Court justices.
